::Shredder::

Shredder growls.

"I would have stayed by your tail." he says in a dangerous tone, "EXCEPT FOR 
I NEARLY GOT SLAGGED IN THE BATTLE THAT YOU STARTED WITH THOSE 
MERCENARIES!!!" He yells out, aiming his pistol at Quickstrike's head.

He stops himself from pulling the trigger as he realizes that Megatron would 
be very unhappy with him if he killed Quickstrike. He growls.

"Allright, next time you try something like that, you'll regret it," he says 
angirly, lowering his gun and putting it away. Grabbing Quickstrike by the 
leg, he sets off toward the CR chambers.
